speaker: speaker1
text: I feel like going for a drink , it's been a long day .

speaker: speaker2
text: Great idea ! Peter , I could use the drink .

speaker: speaker1
text: How about the new bar across road ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Sounds good . The food there is fantastic , too .

speaker: speaker1
text: I agree , I had lunch there last week .

speaker: speaker2
text: excellent ! That sounds like a plan .
